title: New: Candy Paint – One Hundred
content:
Two weeks since falling in love with the sleazy grit of California’s Candy Paint and their debut track Vomit Lips (a slang sexual term if you must know), and the group are back and even better. One Hundred ramps up the level of ‘epic-rocky-ness’, with a ball-busting chorus and a Black Lips style swagger, there’s few acts around at the moment with the talent and attitude of Candy Paint.

Do we erase our clouded minds to feel no pain? / Do we, do we still shame the same?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
